item.title: How i change the xp u get6 from a hit
item.dc:creator: @hey_w8_u_nub hey w8 u nub
item.description:
@hey_w8_u_nub wrote:

Open client.java and search: TotalExp = (double)
it should look like:

TotalExp = (double) (350 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for // faster // leveling // -bakatool TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { . the 350 is 700, cause the double exp. tjust change the 350 to anything you want. (REMEMBER IT DOUBLES THE XP AMOUNT WHAT YOU PUT IN)
